mapper.select:
select
from user_info where user_company = #{userCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND user_code like #{search} OR user_name like #{search} OR user_sex like #{search} OR user_academy like #{search} OR user_phone like #{search} OR user_major like #{search} order by user_code ASC
